block.cd4017be_lib.energy_supp.tip: Infinite supply and sink for Forge Energy with power statistics and configurable I/O limits.
block.cd4017be_lib.fluid_supp.tip: Infinite supply and sink for up to 12 different Fluids with individual I/O counters.
block.cd4017be_lib.item_supp.tip: Infinite supply and sink for up to 64 different Items with individual I/O counters.
gui.cd4017be.energy_supp.name: Energy supply
